content:
Bitwig Studio是由 Bitwig GmbH 开发的专有数字音频工作站。Bitwig 适用于Linux、macOS和Windows。Bitwig 是现场表演的乐器以及作曲、录音、编曲、混音和母带制作的工具。它提供了一套用于节拍匹配、淡入淡出的控件，以及唱盘歌手使用的其他效果。Bitwig 支持传统的线性音乐编排和非线性（基于剪辑）制作。它具有多显示器和触摸屏支持。Bitwig 以其强大的调制、和自动化功能而著称。Bitwig目前的稳定版本是“Bitwig Studio 4.0”，于2021年7月13日发布。2017年，Bitwig Studio被Computer Music杂志评为年度DAW 。

 

历史

Bitwig由 Claes Johanson、Pablo Sara、Nicholas Allen 和 Volker Schumacher 于 2009 年在柏林创立和开发。自 2010 年以来，Placidus Schelbert在离任Ableton国际销售经理后一直担任Bitwig的首席执行官。
contentEn:
Bitwig Studio is a proprietary digital audio workstation developed by Bitwig GmbH. Bitwig is available for Linux, macOS, and Windows. Bitwig is designed to be an instrument for live performances as well as a tool for composing, recording, arranging, mixing, and mastering. It offers a suite of controls for beatmatching, crossfading, and other effects used by turntablists. Bitwig supports both traditional linear music arrangement and non-linear (clip-based) production. It has multi-monitor and touch screen support. Bitwig is notable for its strong modulation,[2] and automation capabilities.[3] The current stable version of Bitwig is "Bitwig Studio 4.0", and was released on 13 July 2021. In 2017, Bitwig Studio was named DAW of the year by Computer Music (magazine).[4][5]

 

History

Bitwig was founded and developed in Berlin by Claes Johanson, Pablo Sara, Nicholas Allen and Volker Schumacher in 2009.[6] Since 2010, Placidus Schelbert has been the CEO after he left his position as an International Sales Manager at Ableton, in the same year.[7]
